SELECT m.id, m.member_name as memberName, m.member_yn as memberYn, m.login_id as loginId, m.email, m.picture, date_format(m.register_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as registerTime, d.name as department, m.comment, m.phone FROM member_app m, department d WHERE m.department = d.id and m.member_yn = 'N' order by m.register_time
